content:
This night in the sky above the Dnipropetrovsk region, 10 drones were shot down in Pavlograd, Kryvyi Rih, Dniprovsky, Kamyansky districts.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak.

In addition, 4 enemy rockets were destroyed over the city of the Dnieper.

As a result of the blows, several energy sites have been damaged - in the Dnieper, Kryvyi Rih and Kamyansky districts. One of them was affected by a man. He was provided with the necessary medical care, he will recover at home.

In Kamyansky, where the enemy has trumped a country cooperative, five more wounded. Among them is a 5-year-old girl. The child was provided with medical care, he will be treated on an outpatient basis. Like the affected women 19 and 47. At the same time, two men, 36 and 47 years old were hospitalized. One of them is in serious condition.

3 summer houses are destroyed, 4 more are damaged. Craped cars.

Sergei Lisak added that the terror of Nikopol region does not stop. Due to the attack on Nikopol, which occurred yesterday in the evening, damaged sanatorium, 3 private homes, outbuildings.

At night, the enemy hit the Marganets community and Nikopol. Destroyed shop. Damaged pavilion for clothing repair. There are no victims.

As reported by the Armyinform, at night the Russians during a massive combined attack againThey hiton energy facilities in several regions of Ukraine.
title: In Dnipropetrovsk, drones and rockets were knocked down at night, several energy objects were damaged
description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak. In addition, over the city ...
author: Army Inform
